trans-unit.source:
Accordion multiexpand
If you activate this option, then the accordion will let the user to keep all the tabs open.
(Default: 1 Tab always opened)

Accordion all closed
If you activate this option, then the accordion will let the user to keep all the tabs closed.
(Default: 1 Tab always opened)

Accordion all closed
If you activate this option, then the accordion will be disabled and the user will not be able to open any tab.
(Default: 1 Tab always opened)

Accordion speed
Define the time im ms in which the tab's content will be revealed.
(Tip: 1s = 1000ms)
